meanings.sent1: The rubber band showed its extensibility when it stretched easily.
meanings.sent2: The extensibility of the fabric allowed for a comfortable fit.
meanings.sent3: The extensibility of the dough made it fun to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like the extensibility of a rubber band, always able to stretch a little more.
meanings.sent5: The extensibility of the rope was tested as it was pulled taut across the gap.

meanings.definition: The ability to be stretched or expanded
meanings.sent1: The extensibility of the balloon allowed it to grow larger.
meanings.sent2: Yoga helps improve the body's extensibility and flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The extensibility of the rubber band made it a popular toy.
meanings.sent4: His mind had an extensibility that allowed him to consider various possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The extensibility of the bridge was crucial during the earthquake.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be lengthened or enlarged
meanings.sent1: The extensibility of the cable made it ideal for the project.
meanings.sent2: The extensibility of the material was essential for the design.
meanings.sent3: The extensibility of the garden hose made watering the plants easier.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had an extensibility that knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The extensibility of the city's infrastructure was put to the test during the population boom.
